abstract: Contaminated traditional beer kills 56 people at funeral in Mozambique, and 49 others are admitted to hospitals for poisoning.
lead_paragraph: Those who drank the contaminated traditional brew were attending a funeral in the region on Saturday, a health official said
snippet: Those who drank the contaminated traditional brew were attending a funeral in the region on Saturday, a health official said

headline.main: Mozambique: Contaminated Beer Kills More Than 50
headline.print_headline: Mozambique: Contaminated Beer Kills More Than 50
